text:
Dixie Jane D'Amelio (born August 12, 2001) is an American social media personality. She is known for her videos on the social media platform TikTok. D'Amelio is the older sister of Charli D'Amelio.
D'Amelio's career began after her sister Charli gained popularity on TikTok. Dixie D'Amelio also began posting on TikTok. She is the 7th most-followed individual on TikTok. In 2020, she starred in the YouTube web series "Attaway General".
